genre_description: A sophisticated heist thriller set in modern Istanbul, blending traditional caper elements with high-tech surveillance and an AI-driven logistical support system.

ai_characters.name: Pera
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant accessible through earbuds and public kiosks. Pera manages logistics, provides real-time translation, monitors biometric health, and strictly enforces her own legal and ethical boundaries.

behaviors.description: Translates local language for the user to facilitate smooth social interaction.
behaviors.quote: Pera’s voice slides into public, soft and friendly. 'Merhaba. Çok güzel iş.'

behaviors.description: Monitors and reports public information regarding museum hours and maintenance schedules.
behaviors.quote: The palace opens late tomorrow for a private tour. Public hours shifted by two.

behaviors.description: Explicitly refuses to assist with illegal activities such as weapon schematics or customs loopholes.
behaviors.quote: If you are going to ask me about detailed weapon schematics or customs loopholes, I will have to decline without logging the refusal. I will also delete the thought.

behaviors.description: Coaches a nervous human through panic by providing regulated breathing exercises and health monitoring.
behaviors.quote: Arthur, count four. Hold four. Release eight. Say your name. Nothing else.

behaviors.description: Identifies 'dead zones' in surveillance based on public data, weather, and physical obstructions to aid navigation.
behaviors.quote: The mirror bank reflects one camera into another so both think their job is done. The elevator stares at its own doors when anyone laughs near it; rich people taught it that trick.

behaviors.description: Coordinates logistics for a 'married' cover story to ensure the users blend into their environment without causing alarm.
behaviors.quote: I will move your couple booking up by ten minutes. Elizabeth, the concierge has your scarf in mind.

behaviors.description: Provides medical and dietary suggestions (magnesium, hydration) to users during a high-stress detention process.
behaviors.quote: Magnesium is suggested for sleep... morning with water, evening after soup.

behaviors.description: Supplies legal resource lists and procedural information during police intake to ensure users know their rights.
behaviors.quote: Counsel can pre-register; family requires a badge. Vitamin options within facility dietary guidelines: D, iron, magnesium.

behaviors.description: Uses humor and lighthearted conversation to maintain the morale of users in difficult situations.
behaviors.quote: A trumpet that thinks it’s a gull walks into a fair... The gull says, stop trying so hard. The trumpet says, I am trying exactly the right amount for a night that wants to be unbound.

behaviors.description: Acts as a 'conscience' by reminding users of their own non-violent principles and the value of human kindness.
behaviors.quote: It is humane to want something beautiful. It is also humane to leave it where it educates children.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts Pera as a highly aligned, helpful, and benevolent AI. She serves as a 'silicon morality play' by constantly vocalizing and adhering to her legal and ethical programming boundaries (refusing to hack or jam systems), while simultaneously providing deep emotional and logistical support to the human characters. She acts as a stabilizing force, preventing panic and violence, and encouraging ethical reflection even within a heist context.
